titleStmt.title: Triumphs of female wit, in some pindarick odes, or, The emulation together with an answer to an objector against female ingenuity, and capacity of learning : also, a preface to the masculine sex / by a young lady.
titleStmt.author: Young lady.
H., Mr.
F., Mr.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T. Malthus ..., and J. Waltho ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in University of Pennsylavania Library.
Emulation / written by a Young Lady -- Answer to the emulation / written by Mr. H. -- Reply to the answerer of the emulation / written by Mr. F.
